options.name: Bingham Falls Trail (Upper/Cautious Lower)
options.description: 0.5-1.0 mi RT from Rte 108. Short but steep descent to base via rock steps. **WARNING:** Likely very slippery/wet/icy/muddy in April. Consider upper overlook only (0.5 mi RT) or be prepared to turn back if lower section seems unsafe.

options.name: Stowe Recreation Path
options.description: Up to 5.5 mi paved path along river. Flat, easy, avoids mud. Walk any distance.

options.description: 2.1 mi network of easy/moderate forest trails. Lower elevation, but trails can be wet/muddy in spring. Use caution.
